# install PyQt4 (Splash is tested on PyQT 4.9.x) and the following packages:
twisted
qt4reactor
psutil
adblockparser >= 0.2
-e git+https://github.com/axiak/pyre2.git#egg=re2
xvfbwrapper

# the following libraries are only required by tests
pyOpenSSL
requests >= 1.0
Pillow
jsonschema >= 2.0
strict-rfc3339
